esios2fd: Download and Convert ESIOS Indicators to Functional Data

Source: R/esios2fd-package.R
esios2fd.Rd

The esios2fd package provides tools to fetch time-series data from Spain's ESIOS API and transform raw series into standardized formats and functional data objects. With esios2fd you can:

  • Retrieve and save indicator metadata (IDs, names, units) via esios2indicators().

  • Download raw time-series CSV files with uniform timestamps via esios2csv().

  • Convert CSV data into functional data (`fdata`) objects, handling DST shifts, via esios2fdata().

  • Assemble daily curves into an `ldata` object for multivariate analysis via esios2lfdata().

  • Directly fetch time-series into a data.frame with esios2df().

Details

Functions in this package follow ESIOS API usage guidelines: you must supply a personal API token and respect rate limits by caching responses when exposing public applications. See https://api.esios.ree.es for more info.

Author

Manuel Oviedo de la Fuente [manuel.oviedo@udc.es]
